title: Massive ping and lag increases during the PM hours.
body:
So... I'm curious. Why the f*ck do I ping 40-80 ms all day long to the Riot servers, then around 7 pm or later the ping is spiking to 250-400ms. I'm the only person on my network and I have a 100 Mb connection. Before they moved their servers to the central area I never had any issues... but now.. its ridiculous, can't play any type of game in the evening. Routing going that badly on the interwebz?  

PS:  And yes, I haven't played much since they moved them due to playing CS back in the day, I knew better than to try a central server.

replies.body: Your ISP could be changing how it routes you to the game servers and causing an increase in ping, but there could be other factors as well.  Go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide just in case something is degrading your connection to the game server.  You can also run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an over view of whatever is happening around that time.  Let me know if it helps!
